ruleBP_R0002.name: Invalid XML against schema
ruleBP_R0002.message: XML document is invalid against the schema.

ruleBP_R0003.name: Duplicated project name
ruleBP_R0003.message: The following project name was used in the submitted projects more than one time. Please provide unique project name.

ruleBP_R0004.name: Duplicated project title and description
ruleBP_R0004.message: Both project title and description are duplicated with the submitted projects. Duplicated project should not be submitted.

ruleBP_R0005.name: Identical project title and description
ruleBP_R0005.message: Project title and description are identical. Please provide more detailed description.

ruleBP_R0006.name: Short project description
ruleBP_R0006.message: Project description is too short. Description text must be more than 100 characters.

ruleBP_R0007.name: Empty description for other relevance
ruleBP_R0007.message: Text description for the Relevance 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of the Relevance 'Other'.

ruleBP_R0008.name: Empty description for other subtype
ruleBP_R0008.message: Text description for the subtype 'Other' is not provided. Please provide DescriptionSubtypeOther.

ruleBP_R0009.name: Empty target description for other sample_scope
ruleBP_R0009.message: Text description for the sample_scope 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of target.

ruleBP_R0010.name: Empty target description for other material
ruleBP_R0010.message: Text description for the material 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of target.

ruleBP_R0011.name: Empty target description for other capture
ruleBP_R0011.message: Text description for the capture 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of target.

ruleBP_R0012.name: Empty method description for other method_type
ruleBP_R0012.message: Text description for the method_type 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of method.

ruleBP_R0013.name: Empty data description for other data_type
ruleBP_R0013.message: Text description for the data_type 'Other' is not provided. Please provide description of data.

ruleBP_R0014.name: Invalid publication identifier
ruleBP_R0014.message: Invalid publication identifier, enter valid pubmed id, pmc id or DOI.

ruleBP_R0015.name: Empty publication reference
ruleBP_R0015.message: Publication reference is not provided. Please provide reference in free-text when id is not available.

ruleBP_R0016.name: Invalid umbrella project
ruleBP_R0016.message: Invalid project is selected as an umbrella project. Please select a valid umbrella project.

ruleBP_R0017.name: Missing strain/isolate/cultivar
ruleBP_R0017.message: At least one of strain/isolate/cultivar is required for monoisolate organism.

ruleBP_R0018.name: Taxonomy at species or infraspecific rank
ruleBP_R0018.message: Taxonomy should be species or infraspecific level.

ruleBP_R0019.name: Empty organism description for multi-species
ruleBP_R0019.message: Organism description is required when sample scope is multi-species.

ruleBP_R0020.name: Metagenome or environmental
ruleBP_R0020.message: When sample_scope is "Environment", taxonomy must be a metagenome where lineage starts with unclassified sequences and scientific name ends with 'metagenome'.

ruleBP_R0021.name: Invalid locus tag prefix
ruleBP_R0021.message: Locus tag prefix and DDBJ BioSample accession pair is invalid.

ruleBP_R0022.name: Invalid BioSample accession
ruleBP_R0022.message: Invalid BioSample accession. Please provide a valid BioSample accession with format SAMD\d+

ruleBP_R0037.name: Multiple projects
ruleBP_R0037.message: Only one project is allowed in BioProject XML

ruleBP_R0038.name: Taxonomy name and id not match
ruleBP_R0038.message: Organism and taxonomy id do not match.

ruleBP_R0039.name: Taxonomy error warning
ruleBP_R0039.message: Submission processing may be delayed due to necessary curator review. Please check spelling of organism, current information generated the following error message and will require a taxonomy consult.

ruleBP_R0041.name: Invalid locus tag prefix format
ruleBP_R0041.message: Locus tag prefix must be 3-12 alphanumeric characters and the first character may not be a digit.
